trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud is ready to bring the people together.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_TODO_00<tab>Show the blessed scale to Mamook's citizens.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_TODO_02<tab>Show the blessed scale to the worker in Golmajiik Grove.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_TODO_03<tab>Wait at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_KRILE_000_001<tab>It's amazing how Wuk Lamat can connect with anyone. She has an incredible gift.

TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_ERENVILLE_000_002<tab>To think that there was such a dark secret behind blessed siblings... Even among the Mamool Ja, I cannot imagine many know the whole truth─especially not those who reside in the capital.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_003<tab>The only way to help Mamook is to understand Mamook. We won't let Bakool Ja Ja down!

TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_ALISAIE_000_004<tab>...Sometimes it's best to just forgive and move on. It can be difficult─gods, don't I know it─but that's all the more reason to try your damndest to look past how you were wronged and let bygones be bygones.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>We haven't a moment to lose.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_ALPHINAUD_000_006<tab>According to Miilal Ja, Moxutural Zooj is an abandoned settlement northwest of the city. It should afford us the privacy we require.

TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_ALPHINAUD_100_006<tab>We must work quickly, lest Zereel Ja discover our intentions. Fortunately, Bakool Ja Ja thought to give us additional scales, so we might cover more ground in less time.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_007<tab>Everyone should take one and get going. Use them to gather as many people as you can.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_008<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let's retrace our steps. Maybe this time we can convince folks to lend an ear.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_010<tab>Look! I've already made a new friend!
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWABLUNT04904_000_011<tab>...
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWABLUNT04904_000_012<tab>...That scale. If the blessed trust you, then so will I.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWABLUNT04904_000_013<tab>So, what is it that you require of me?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWABLUNT04904_000_014<tab>Bakool Ja Ja bids us come to Moxutural Zooj?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWABLUNT04904_000_015<tab>A strange place for an assembly, but very well. I will not refuse he who fights for our dreams.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_HOOBIGOMALESHOP_000_016<tab>Did I not tell you to move along? I can't be seen talking with the likes of you!
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_HOOBIGOMALESHOP_000_017<tab>A blessed scale? In an outsider's hands? ...What business do you have with me?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_HOOBIGOMALESHOP_000_018<tab>So Bakool Ja Ja sent you to call an assembly... I'm not sure what to make of this, but I shall go to Moxutural Zooj at once.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>Have you managed to gather some of the good folks?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_021<tab>Wonderful! The esteemed Bakool Ja Ja will be pleased. This fellow here will be coming to Moxutural Zooj as well.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_022<tab>Apparently, there's a najool nursery to the west called Golmajiik Grove. Could you go and see who you can talk to there as well?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_023<tab>I'll meet you in Moxutural Zooj afterwards. There's just one more person I need to find!
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWABANANA04906_000_046<tab>Leave this place, outsider.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWABANANA04906_000_047<tab>Oh! My apologies, I was unaware. I thank you, blessed scale bearer, for bringing me word of this gathering.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWABANANA04906_000_048<tab>I shall away to Moxutural Zooj at once.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWABANANA04906_000_050<tab>Now that I think on it, why would Bakool Ja Ja grant you his scale...?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_HOOBIGOMALESHOP_000_051<tab>What a curious place to gather...
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWABLUNT04904_000_052<tab>Whatever Bakool Ja Ja requires of me, I shall happily provide.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>Where's Wuk Lamat?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_061<tab>Sorry to keep you waiting!
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_ALPHINAUD_000_062<tab>You invited the Second Promise as well?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_KOANA_000_063<tab><sigh> Lamaty'i. Need I remind you that this rite is a competition?

TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_KOANA_000_064<tab>Whatever advantage you're about to share with me, you ought to utilize to your own benefit. I have barely made headway in communicating with the locals─at this rate, you lead the race to the golden city.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_065<tab>I need your help.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_KOANA_000_066<tab>To complete the feat?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_067<tab>No, no. Mamook has a problem I can't solve on my own, and you're the most clever person I know.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_068<tab>I want you to hear the people firsthand, so that we might come up with a way to help them.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_KOANA_000_069<tab>Very well. I am at your disposal.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>Everyone, thank you for gathering on such short notice! I am Wuk Lamat, Third Promise of Tuliyollal.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWAMALEUNFRIENDLY_000_071<tab>Promise? I thought you served Bakool Ja Ja!
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_HOOBIGOMALESHOP_000_072<tab>You deceived us!?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BAKOOLJAJA_000_073<tab>(-Bakool Ja Ja the Mighty-)No. They did not.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BAKOOLJAJA_000_074<tab>(-Bakool Ja Ja the Mighty-)The scales they showed you were mine. I entrusted them to the Third Promise and her retinue.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_HOOBIGOMALESHOP_000_075<tab>Why honor these outsiders so?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BAKOOLJAJA_000_076<tab>(-Bakool Ja Ja the Mighty-)Because Wuk Lamat has won my trust. Now, you will hear her words.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_077<tab>Bakool Ja Ja shared with me the truth about blessed siblings. About the price you pay to conceive them.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_078<tab>As an outsider to your community, it is not my place to judge you or your culture.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_079<tab>Culture is born of the experiences of its people. Of their lives and their land.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_080<tab>But it breaks my heart to know that yours has brought you all so much suffering.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_081<tab>If any here wish to break from the cycle of tragedy that creating blessed siblings demands, I ask that you join us.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BAKOOLJAJA_100_081<tab>(-Bakool Ja Ja the Mighty-)Please. I don't want any more of our children to die.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_HOOBIGOMALESHOP_200_081<tab>...You think we <var 1A 02 /var>want<var 1A 01 /var> this!?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_HOOBIGOMALESHOP_000_082<tab>We have no choice! Only blessed siblings can liberate us from our suffering. Without them, we have nothing!

TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BAKOOLJAJA_000_085<tab>(-Bakool Ja Ja the Mystic-)That remains to be seen. Speak with the Third Promise. Share with her your worries and your pain, and together we may find a new way forward.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_HOOBIGOMALESHOP_100_086<tab>Together...?
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_HOOBIGOMALESHOP_000_086<tab>If she is trustworthy...then I will speak with her.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_MIILALJA_000_087<tab>It would be best if you withdrew, my son. Many cannot yet speak freely in your presence.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_ALISAIE_000_088<tab>Let's keep an eye out for Zereel Ja. He wouldn't take kindly to this sort of gathering.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_089<tab>Once we understand everyone's concerns, we'll be better equipped to help them. Let's make sure they feel heard.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_HOOBIGOFEMALECONFUSED_000_094<tab>Even if Bakool Ja Ja trusts the Third Promise, I don't know if I'm comfortable discussing this with her...
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWABANANA04906_000_095<tab>An end to blessed siblings...?

TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_HOOBIGOMALESHOP_000_096<tab>Belief in blessed siblings and the salvation they would bring has sustained me for years and years. But if there's another way...if the Third Promise can truly help us...
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_BOONEWABLUNT04904_000_097<tab>I don't know what to think or how to feel about this...
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_MIILALJA_100_097<tab>I'm sure my son would have preferred to stay, but his presence alone still greatly sways our people's behavior.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_098<tab>I'm glad Koana agreed to help us.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_099<tab>He's always been good at solving complicated problems. Me, not so much─but I'll support Mamook's people however I can.
TEXT_KINGMC110_04906_WUKLAMAT_000_100<tab>By combining our respective strengths, we'll help them discover a new source of hope. I know we will!
